column5: Here is a few more photo's of what I am working with/on
My son mailed your rivets today.

Thank you very much Irishfield, I would like to extend a huge thank you to Irishfield for helping me out, way more then he had to. Great advice and thanks for the rivets I don't know what to say besides thank you :-) Any pictures I post on updates feel free to comment on them good, bad or ugly lol.  Again big thanks to Irishfield   Nelson
Put a #30 drill bit in there as well...just to be sure. Can be hard to source in some towns.
That karma keeps growing!  Good on you Wayne   Don
If we don't catch the biggest damn Pickeraleyes next week...it's someone elses turn to work on their Karma! LOL
It not about catching fish - remember Wayne! You just had a great day out on the water with no fish to show for your efforts - great day just the same!   LOL   Don
Wayne is truly a stand up guy here.  He goes out of his way to help people out.  We could use a few more Wayne's in this world.  Wait...Wayne's World....ahhh...forget it.....

Yup amazing guy, cant thank him enough :-) Hopefully I will be able to return the favor and take him out fishing once my boat is completely if only I had money and a shop I would be done in a few days lol

Just updated my blog it now contains a link to all my pictures I have taken feel free to let me know what you think for repairs and layout, I think I will have to replace a few rivets no matter what, Irishfield has me covered on the patch I needed so I am well on my way
Some more update pics on the patch and sealing
Looks like it's coming along nicely Maureen
